title: Ashok Leyland total vehicle sales decline to 15,939 units in Jan
description: Ashok Leyland, a commercial vehicle manufacturer, reported a 7% decline in total vehicle sales, including exports, for January, amounting to 15,939 units. In the corresponding period of the previous year, the company had sold 17,200 units, as stated in a press release.
